messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Dormitories.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: God doesn't let the bad win the good, fine, thank you

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unidentified lifesigns detected coming aboard Space Station 13. Secure any exterior access, including ducting and ventilation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Chief Engineer's Office.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: looks like you ran into our new film set for attack of the heads oops.
